title: Herd health coordination
text: Herd health coordination. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems. We start work before sunrise during harvest. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We design protocols for herd health management. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We record yields and monitor feed intake. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. The tractor needs a safety check before operation.
